title: Face 2D Live
description: Control 2D faces with the Live Link Face app on your iPhone or iPad to create fast and easy to make cartoons with your friends!
longDescription:
Face 2D Live allows you to control 2D faces which can be easily customized. Need a talking tree? Simply attach a face blueprint to a tree, connect your phone to Live Link and simulate! Want to add a funny face to your Third Person character? That's easy! Attach the blueprint to the head of your character, connect your phone and play! You can grow it, shrink it, flip it and move it and as long as your phone is connected and tracking your face, it'll keep on working like it should. It's a lot of fun, especially with friends. What make this 2D face controller different from the other tutorials you'll find online? This one allows you to record your animations using Take Recorder. Give it a try!


PRODUCT DEMO - Face2DLive Version 1.1:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1jx-Ol_tnaYy


PRODUCT DEMO - Face2DLive Version 1.2

TUTORIAL - Learn The Basics:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=El_h1uFYTZI
technicalDetails:
Features:


  • Blueprints for real-time streaming / recording 2D faces in a 3D space
  • 28 sprites containing fun face shapes
  • Meshes for eyes, eyelids and pupils


Number of Blueprints: 2


Input: Made to be used with Apple smart devices compatible with the Live Link Face app


Network Replicated: No


Supported Development Platforms: Unknown


Windows: Yes


Mac: Unknown


Documentation: For a full tutorial on how this blueprint works, see the tutorial link above. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out and I'll do my best to provide support.


Important/Additional Notes: The following plug-ins are required to use this project - Python Script Plug-in, Sequencer Scripting, Takes, Virtual Production Utilities, Virtual Camera, Composure, Live Link, Media Framework Utilities, Media IO Framework, nDisplay, Apple AR Kit, Apple AR Kit Face Support, Pixel Streaming, Movie Render Pipeline
